data.event: The population was 2,180 at the time of the 2010 census.

event.title: hinted at by the town's incorporation date of March 5th, 1855

data.event: by the Court of Massachusetts Bay, Huntington has a colorful history, hinted at by the town's incorporation date of March 5th, 1855, decades later than the towns around it.
The solution that resulted in the town we call home today was crafted by a Northampton attorney named Charles Huntington.
